About This Game

Travel across Europe as king of the road, a trucker who delivers important cargo across impressive distances! With dozens of cities to explore from the UK, Belgium, Germany, Italy, the Netherlands, Poland, and many more, your endurance, skill and speed will all be pushed to their limits. If youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve got what it takes to be part of an elite trucking force, get behind the wheel and prove it!
Key Features:

 Ã‚Â  Ã‚Â Transport a vast variety of cargo across more than 60 European cities.
 Ã‚Â  Ã‚Â Run your own business which continues to grow even as you complete your freight deliveries.
 Ã‚Â  Ã‚Â Build your own fleet of trucks, buy garages, hire drivers, manage your company for maximum profits.
 Ã‚Â  Ã‚Â A varied amount of truck tuning that range from performance to cosmetic changes.
 Ã‚Â  Ã‚Â Customize your vehicles with optional lights, bars, horns, beacons, smoke exhausts, and more.
 Ã‚Â  Ã‚Â Thousands of miles of real road networks with hundreds of famous landmarks and structures. 

World of Trucks
Take advantage of additional features of Euro Truck Simulator 2 by joining our online community on World of Trucks, our center for virtual truckers all around the world interested in Euro Truck Simulator 2 and future SCS Software's truck simulators.

 Ã‚Â  Ã‚Â Use in-game Photo Mode to capture the best moments and share them with thousands of people who love trucks.
